Example

Explain here some stuff with MarkDown. Let’s create some numbers:

import numpy as np

a = np.linspace(0,1,10)
print(a)

[0.         0.11111111 0.22222222 0.33333333 0.44444444 0.55555556
 0.66666667 0.77777778 0.88888889 1.        ]

That was it!
